individual_membership.name: Free admission to the art gallery
individual_membership.description: Members receive free admission to the art gallery, including special exhibitions.

individual_membership.name: 10% discount on art purchases
individual_membership.description: Members receive a 10% discount on all art purchases, including prints, paintings, and sculptures.

family_membership.name: Free admission to the art gallery for up to 2 adults and 2 children
family_membership.description: Family members receive free admission to the art gallery, including special exhibitions.

family_membership.name: 15% discount on art purchases
family_membership.description: Family members receive a 15% discount on all art purchases, including prints, paintings, and sculptures.

family_membership.name: Invitation to exclusive member events
family_membership.description: Family members are invited to exclusive member events, such as gallery talks, receptions, and workshops.

patron_membership.name: Free admission to the art gallery for up to 4 adults and 4 children
patron_membership.description: Patron members receive free admission to the art gallery, including special exhibitions.

patron_membership.name: 20% discount on art purchases
patron_membership.description: Patron members receive a 20% discount on all art purchases, including prints, paintings, and sculptures.

patron_membership.name: Invitation to exclusive patron events
patron_membership.description: Patron members are invited to exclusive patron events, such as private tours, dinners, and receptions.

patron_membership.name: Recognition in the art gallery's annual report
patron_membership.description: Patron members' names are recognized in the art gallery's annual report.

student_membership.name: Free admission to the art gallery for up to 2 students
student_membership.description: Students receive free admission to the art gallery, including special exhibitions.

student_membership.name: 5% discount on art purchases
student_membership.description: Students receive a 5% discount on all art purchases, including prints, paintings, and sculptures.
